
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(boot)
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(tidyr)
library(forcats)
library(here)
library(fixest)
library(modelsummary)

df <- readRDS(here("data", "processed", "air_quality_smooth.rds"))
```

```{r}
model <- feols(aqi ~ after_reform + windspeed | sitename, data = df)

summary(model)
modelsummary(list("Model" = model), stars = TRUE, coef_omit = -1)
```

```{r}
predict(model, tibble(after_reform = c(FALSE, TRUE), county = "Changhua County"))
```
